Rapidash (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0077: Ponyta
Pokémon
#0079: Slowpoke →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Rapidash (TCG Pocket).

Rapidash has been featured on 28 different cards since it debuted in the Jungle expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Rapidash cards are normally Fire-type or Psychic-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Rapidash

Rapidash
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
